sources.title: My Brother the Pig - Starring Scarlett Johansson - Full Movie
sources.description:
Click here to watch great FREE Movies & TV: http://filmrise.com

Being a teen is tough enough for Kathy Cauldwell (Scarlett Johansson) without having to be the target of her little brother George's constant practical jokes. She knew her brother was a pest, but life takes a bizarre turn when her dad (Judge Reinholt) and mom leave for France and some ancient hocus-pocus turns George into an a real pig!

Now, they're off on a madcap Mexican adventure, chased by a bacon-loving bad guy, as they use their nanny Matildaâ€™s (Eva Mendes) help to muster up the magic to change George back into a boy. With an all-star cast, this family comedy gem is a must see!

#freemovies #moviesondemand #fullmovie

metadata.Plot: Being a teen is tough enough for Kathy Cauldwell without having to be the target of her little brother George's constant practical jokes. Then their parents leave for France and George is magically transformed into a pig via some of their nanny Matilda's ancient rocks.
metadata.Actors: Scarlett Johansson, Eva Mendes, Judge Reinhold
